channel.title: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]
channel.description:
oke so i want that there are 3 difrend homes for 3 groups.
so if group 1 clicks the home tele in they tele to their home
but if someone from another group does that same teleport it teleport him to another home of his group.
i already made 3 variables for this called
group1 group2 group3
so plz help me this is what the code in clickingmost is, tell me what ive to put there : [code]case 73100: case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(3082+misc.random(3),3421+misc.random(3), 0); break;[/code]

item.title: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

it already does the story of my server gona be told and then they have to choose
with nation they want.

then when they go into the portal of 1 of the nation

its gona be for exmaple

group1 = 0
group2 = 1
group3 = 0

but now i need that home teleport in spellbook that teleports to the home of ur nation

and that all 3 nations can use the same home tab in spellbook

Read full topic
item.source: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]

item.title: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

How hard could it be? Just let the players choose its ‘nation’, then save it to its character file. if it’s nation 1 the home location is set to ####, #### etc. etc.

Read full topic
item.source: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]

item.title: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“BitchPk, post:1, topic:413185”]oke so i want that there are 3 difrend homes for 3 groups.

so if group 1 clicks the home tele in they tele to their home

but if someone from another group does that same teleport it teleport him to another home of his group.

i already made 3 variables for this called

group1
group2
group3

so plz help me
this is what the code in clickingmost is, tell me what ive to put there
: case 73100: case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(3082+misc.random(3),3421+misc.random(3), 0); break;[/quote]

Well i think what i would do it make a public int
and then when someone clicks the home teleport make it be like
if public int name == 1 then tele to this spot if == 2 then here and so on.

And when someone first loggs into the server make an interface like the player design interface expect choses which “group” there in.

Read full topic
item.source: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]

item.title: [delta] need help with some expierenced delta code [delta]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“BitchPk, post:3, topic:413185”][quote author=JGX link=topic=514656.msg3736236#msg3736236 date=1314989747]
Why would you want this?
What is the idea behind this?
[/quote]
haha i’m bissy with a big project

runescape splitted in 3 nations but i wont tell my concept till its finished[/quote]

Busy* and oh, okay. Well gl then.
